meanings.definition: Not uniform or consistent in shape, size, or quality.
meanings.sent1: The nonuniform cupcakes were all different sizes.
meanings.sent2: The nonuniform pattern on the fabric made it unique.
meanings.sent3: The nonuniform garden gnomes looked like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her nonuniform handwriting reflected her creative personality.
meanings.sent5: The nonuniform clouds painted a beautiful sky.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to the same standard or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The nonuniform test scores surprised the students.
meanings.sent2: The nonuniform tiles created an interesting mosaic.
meanings.sent3: The nonuniform marching band accidentally formed a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: His nonuniform approach to problem-solving yielded innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The nonuniform stripes on the zebra confused the predators.

meanings.sent1: The nonuniform weather kept changing throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: The nonuniform flavors in the dish created a delightful mix.
meanings.sent3: The nonuniform group of friends always had exciting adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her nonuniform emotions made it hard to predict her reactions.
meanings.sent5: The nonuniform landscapes in the painting captured different moods.
